subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Jr. announced his return to boxing less than a year after he said he was through with the sport. He will fight the lightweight champion Juan Manuel Marquez on July 18. Mayweather, an unbeaten five-time champion, last fought when he stopped Ricky Hatton in the 10th round in December 2007.
